ppy/osu.summary: The osu repository has seen significant activity recently, with multiple push and pull request events. Notably, a pull request was merged to pause playback when entering gameplay test from the editor, addressing an existing issue. Additionally, failing assertions were added and a pull request was opened to implement this gameplay test feature, demonstrating ongoing efforts to refine the gaming experience.

ppy/s3-nginx-proxy.summary: The s3-nginx-proxy repository has experienced notable activity, including a push event to preserve upstream Cache-Control headers. A corresponding pull request was also merged, ensuring that these headers are preserved, which can significantly impact caching behavior and performance in the application.
